long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate web page monitoring tool! 🚀

Imagine an app that:

🔁Automatically refreshes web pages at intervals you set
🔎Scans for keywords you choose
🖥️ Sends instant desktop alerts when it finds a match

Key Features:
✅ Set multiple keywords (comma-separated)
✅ Customize refresh intervals
✅ Option to halt reloads after finding a keyword
✅ Desktop notifications for matches
✅ Keyword highlighting on the page
🖱️NEW: Notifications are now clickable

Privacy First:
🛡️ 100% free from ads, trackers, and cookies
🔒 No usage analytics
💻 All data stays in your browser

Compatibility:
✔️ Tested on Chrome and Brave

Fine Print:
Offered as-is, no warranty
May miss matches on "infinite scrolling" pages due to timing

We value your input!
📧 Send suggestions to kwf-comments@paddleboard.ai
